titleStmt.title: To the Kings Most Excellent Majesty the humble peticion of William Courten, esquire, grandchild and heyre of Sr. William Courten, deceased and George Carew, esquire, administrator of the goods and chattells of Sr. William Courten on the behalf of themselves and several others, your Majesties good subjects of England.
titleStmt.author: Courten, William, 1642-1702.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
